alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Levy; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Levy; Inland Pasco; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued December 23 at 3:13AM EST until December 25 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 24 expected. For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 possible. * WHERE...Sumter, Coastal Levy, Coastal Citrus, Coastal Hernando, Inland Levy, Inland Citrus, Inland Hernando and Inland Pasco Counties. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, from 3 AM to 10 AM EST Saturday. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from late Saturday night through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
